title: Chancey illa Lyrics Namma Chennai Chancey illa Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Chance-ey illa
SInger: Anirudh
Music: Anirudh
Direction and Lyrics: Vignesh Shivan

nee endha ooroda uyira
irundhaalum
unna sondham aakkum da
adhudhaan indha ooru da
indha ooru da

enga beach kaaththu
mela patta podhum da
unakku nalla raasida
ini nee chennai vaasi da

va va vandhu autola
yeri paathiya
anna sollum namma
ooroda uravaada kettiya

Mylapur filter copy
vaasam thookkudhaa
Mount roadu traffic oda
isai thaan ketkkudhaa

machaan chancey illa illa
chancey illa
namma chennai pola namma
oorey illa. (2)

Kodambakkam ulla poi
sootinga thaan paakka vaa
illa t-nagar ulla poi
pudichadha vaangavaa

Andha bodyguard muneersvaran
blessinga thaan ketkka vaa
etti ECR OMR
speeda vandi ottava

SUper STAR oda first day
first show vaa - illa
chennai super kingukku
vizhila podavaa

Namma lovea valarththu
vazha vaikkira
Besent nagar beach-oda
pugala paadavaa

machaan chancey illa illa
chancey illa
namma chennai pola namma
oorey illa. (2)

Vaa nanbaa vaa aada vaa
vaa onna serndhu aada vaa
chennai lifa nalla
kondaada vaa

Idhu namma oo ooru da
innum kaththi kaththi solluda
indha vazhkka engum amayaadhadaa

machaan chancey illa illa
chancey illa
namma chennai pola namma
oorey illa. (2)
